scripts.development: node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:create && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:all && nodemon index.js
scripts.restart: node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:drop && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:create && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate && node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:seed:all && nodemon index.js
scripts.spinup: npm run migrate && npm run dev
scripts.spinupseed: npm run migrate && npm run undoseed && npm run seed && npm run dev
